About The Author

Hi there. My name is Alberto, a Costa Rican illustrator and front end web programmer with a bend towards children's illustration, and Alzamon is my artistic pseudonym based on my full name. In this portfolio site I have gathered my best illustration work and comics for kids I've done over the years along with a Sketchbook section and some articles that I write from time to time. I am currently looking for agent representation.

Learn More / Contact Me
